FuncDef: The display radius-client configuration command displays the configurations of all RADIUS clients.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the configurations of all RADIUS clients, including the IP addresses of RADIUS clients, VPN instances to which RADIUS clients belong, and corresponding RADIUS server group names, run the display radius-client configuration command. The command output helps locate faults.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
